entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/master/api_webgisclient/search-service/deployment/deploymentconfig.yaml -p NAMESPACE=gdi-integration -p TAG=v2.1.2 -p REPLICAS=1 -p CPU_REQUEST=100m -p CPU_LIMIT=200m -p MEMORY_REQUEST=128Mi -p MEMORY_LIMIT=256Mi -p ENVIRONMENT=integration | oc apply -n gdi-integration -f- oc rollout latest -n gdi-integration search-service oc rollout status -n gdi-integration dc search-service
